product.ferreroDescription: NY-style cookie with Ferrero Rocher, dark chocolate chips, and toasted hazelnuts—intense, elegant, and addictive. A New York–style cookie with a European twist. Packed with Ferrero Rocher pieces, dark chocolate chips, and toasted hazelnuts for the perfect crunch. Intense, elegant, and addictive—this cookie never goes unnoticed.

about.title: Our History
about.content:
For more than twelve years, baking has become an essential part of my life. What began as a simple curiosity, accompanied by my husband, soon transformed into a deep passion: creating with my hands small works full of flavor, emotion, and love.

I've always believed that every sweet treat has the power to tell a story, bring a smile to a smile, or revive a special memory. That's why, for me, it's not just about baking. It's about bringing each of my creations to life, taking care of every detail, and putting my heart into every recipe.

Our kitchen isn't just a workplace; it's our dream workshop. It's where we combine tradition, creativity, and a lot of dedication to ensure that each cookie, cake, or dessert conveys more than just good flavor: it conveys love, joy, and the sincere desire to make others happy.

Along this journey, I've learned, failed, improved, and, above all, grown. And although there are still many dreams left to fulfill, every step has been worth it, because I'm doing what I love.

Today, I continue creating, learning, and dreaming hand in hand with my husband. Because as long as there are people who believe in HOMEMADE WITH LOVE, baking will continue to be my way of speaking to the world.

Thank you for being here and for letting us be part of your sweetest moments.

faq.title: FAQ's
faq.content:
How long does it take for your cookies to ship?

All orders are shipped every Monday and Tuesday to ensure freshness and quality.

Are the cookies shipped in a refrigerated package?

Our cookies are not shipped with ice packs or any type of refrigerated packaging. They're designed to stay fresh during normal shipping conditions.

Do you offer gluten-free products?

Not yet — but we're working hard on a gluten-free option and hope to offer it soon!

What's the minimum number of cookies I can order?

Our minimum order is 6 cookies. Each batch takes time and care to make, and this policy helps us maintain efficiency and ensure quality for all orders.

How do I place an order?

You can order directly from our website:

www.DeliZuKar.com

Can I schedule my order?

We're unable to schedule specific shipping or delivery dates.

All orders are shipped on Mondays and Tuesdays only.

testimonials.title: Our Happy Clients
testimonials.adminNote: Testimonials must be marked as active in admin

nayrobis.name: Nayrobis Acosta
nayrobis.comment: Excellent quality, delicious flavor. I can't decide which one is my favorite because they are all delicious. Beautiful packaging, well presented and hygienic. It's worth the investment; the experience is truly worth it.

kayri.name: Kayri Díaz
kayri.comment: I loved these cookies! The texture is perfect, crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. The Lotus filling has a delicious flavor, not too sweet, and with that touch of caramel and spices that I love. You can tell they are made with a lot of love at home. I will definitely buy them again; they are perfect for my afternoon coffee.

naveri.name: Naveri Saint-Hilaire
naveri.comment: I loved all the ones I tried, but my absolute favorites were the carrot and piña colada ones. They are the best; they are definitely my new favorite dessert.

elayne.name: Elayne Cacerez
elayne.comment: I loved the tiny chocolate chip cookies, especially my family, my kids. And the blondies.

antonion.name: Antonion Medrano
antonion.comment: Simply spectacular, I give them five stars... My favorite is the pistachio-filled one!!!!

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.content:
Terms and Conditions of DeliZuKar

1. General Information
These Terms and Conditions govern the use of our website and the purchase of our products.

2. Definitions
- 'We', 'Our company' refers to DeliZuKar
- 'You', 'Customer' refers to the person using our services
- 'Products' refers to the cookies and bakery products we offer

3. Website Use
- The website is intended for personal and non-commercial use only
- You may not reproduce, distribute, or modify content without authorization
- Use of the site for illegal or unauthorized activities is prohibited

4. Product Information
- Product descriptions are accurate at the time of publication
- We reserve the right to modify products without prior notice
- Images are representative and may vary slightly from the final product

5. Prices and Availability
- All prices are in US dollars
- Prices may change without prior notice
- Product availability is subject to stock

6. Privacy Policy
- We respect your privacy and protect your personal information
- We do not share personal information with third parties without consent
- We use cookies to improve your browsing experience

7. Liability Limitations
- Our liability is limited to the value of the purchased product
- We are not responsible for indirect or consequential damages
- We do not guarantee continuous availability of the website

8. Applicable Law
These terms are governed by the laws of the state where our company operates.

9. Modifications
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.

10. Contact
For questions about these terms:
Email: legal@delizukar.com
Phone: (555) 123-4567

Last updated: December 2024

termsService.title: Terms of Service
termsService.content:
Terms of Service of DeliZuKar

1. Acceptance of Terms
By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

2. Service Description
DeliZuKar offers artisanal New York-style cookies, baked with premium ingredients and delivered directly to your door.

3. Orders and Payments
- All orders are subject to availability
- Prices are subject to change without prior notice
- Payment must be made at the time of order
- We accept credit cards and other secure payment methods

4. Shipping and Delivery
- Orders are processed on Mondays and Tuesdays
- Delivery times may vary by location
- We are not responsible for delays caused by third parties
- Products are shipped at room temperature

5. Return Policy
- Due to the perishable nature of our products, we do not accept returns
- If there is a problem with your order, contact us within 24 hours

6. Liability Limitation
- Our liability is limited to the value of the product
- We are not responsible for indirect or consequential damages

7. Modifications
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after publication.

8. Contact
For questions about these terms, contact us at:
Email: info@delizukar.com
Phone: (555) 123-4567

Last updated: December 2024
